abstract: If Rick Perry's supporters were hoping to see a dynamic, energized Texas governor at Tuesday night's debate, they were disappointed.
snippet: If Rick Perry's supporters were hoping to see a dynamic, energized Texas governor at Tuesday night's debate, they were disappointed.
lead_paragraph: HANOVER, N.H. -- If Rick Perry's supporters were hoping for a dynamic, energized Texas governor to fully engage with the moderators, his rivals and the audience, they were disappointed Tuesday night.

headline.main: Perry Fades Into Background in Debate
